resources.string: A siren is triggered when battery charge match with the pre-defined level(0-100%) you saved.Then you can unplug mobile to stop Siren
Based on the code you have saved .you will be able to remotely change mode of your mobile by sending that particular code as SMS to your mobile
Set the level you want and click Save .
To stop the Siren either click stop button or unplug your mobile from USB/Charger
To turn off battery eye set level to Zero and save

Ring Mode is a basic utility which helps you remotely change the ringing mode of your mobile from silent/vibrate to loud. You can do this by sending a code(Not Case-Sensitive) as an SMS to your mobile phone from any other mobile .

Battery Eye is a battery monitoring system. You can set a desired level between (0-100%). A Siren is triggered when your battery reaches the desired level. This works when mobile is plugged in with USB/phone charger.
If you find RingEye App useful, please do rate and comment as they are very valuable to us and help us improve our offerings.
Compliments and bug pointers can be sent to ringmode.batteryeye@gmail.com. Thanks :)
Enter Codes for each Textbox and click on Save. These codes you need to remember.
